name: ECON 133
title: Security Markets and Financial Institutions
description: An examination of all major financial markets: equities, bonds, options, forwards, and futures. Uses modern financial theory, including asset pricing models such as CAPM and APT.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ECON 100A or ECON 100M, and ECON 113.

class_notes: Weekly mandatory online section meeting times will be scheduled during the first week of the course with student input.
